episode_summary: This episode of 'No Such Thing As A Fish' covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the inspiration behind a character in 'The Wizard of Oz', the origins of modern weight loss drugs, the role of caddies in golf, and the incredible strength of parrotfish beaks.

facts.fact: L. Frank Baum based one of the witches in the Wizard of Oz on his mother-in-law.
The journey towards modern weight loss drugs begins with the venom of a Gila monster.
For many years in the 2000s, New Zealand's highest-earning sports personality was Tiger Woods' caddy.
If 88 elephants balanced on a 50p piece on a parrotfish's beak, the beak would not break.
